# [FEAT] Community Forums

## Labels
`knowledge-base`, `customer-experience`, `priority:low`

## Description
Implement community forums for customer-to-customer support and engagement.

## Requirements

### Forum Structure
- Forum categories/boards
- Topics/threads
- Posts/replies
- Nested replies (optional)
- Pinned topics

### User Features
- Create topics
- Reply to topics
- Edit own posts
- Delete own posts
- Subscribe to topics
- User profiles

### Moderation
- Moderator roles
- Post approval workflow
- Report inappropriate content
- Edit/delete any post
- Lock/close topics
- Move topics between forums

### Engagement Features
- Upvoting/liking posts
- Best answer marking
- User reputation/points
- Badges and achievements
- Leaderboards

### Integration
- Link forum posts to tickets
- Convert post to ticket
- Agent participation
- Knowledge base cross-links
- Search integration

## Zendesk Reference
Zendesk supports community forums where customers can connect and collaborate, crowdsource support, share knowledge, and provide feedback.

## Acceptance Criteria
- [ ] Forum structure works
- [ ] User posting functional
- [ ] Moderation tools available
- [ ] Engagement features work
- [ ] Integration with tickets
